title: Jim Cramer says AMD's slide could be an opportunity — plus, a defense of Salesforce
description: Every weekday, the Investing Club releases the Homestretch; an actionable afternoon update just in time for the last hour of trading.
excerpt: Every weekday, the Investing Club releases the Homestretch; an actionable afternoon update just in time for the last hour of trading.
text: Every weekday, the CNBC Investing Club with Jim Cramer releases the Homestretch — an actionable afternoon update, just in time for the last hour of trading on Wall Street.
html: Every weekday, the CNBC Investing Club with Jim Cramer releases the Homestretch — an actionable afternoon update, just in time for the last hour of trading on Wall Street.
